attributes.action: Do not send British troops to Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: It is not our war to fight. We have enough problems at home to deal with. This country of ours is in a mess, financially and morally.
attributes.background: The government  must seriously consider the consequences of sending British troops to Ukraine.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Commit to not deploying British Troops to Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747668
